API Code¶

This section contains the documentation required to use the API.

Overview¶

APIrequests

Functions¶

APIrequests.requestJson(pageNumber: str) → dict¶

Return the response of the request.

Parameters

pageNumber (str) – Page number needed for request pagination.

Returns

Dictionary of response.

Return type

dict

APIrequests.apiRequest(url: str, token: str) → requests.models.Response¶

Set the parameters for the request.

Parameters

  • url (str) – URL of the request.

  • token (str) – AniAPI token.

Returns

Response of the request.

Return type

requests.Response

APIrequests.checkResponseStatusCode(response: dict) → bool¶

Check the response status code to handle errors.

Parameters

response (dict) – Response of the request.

Returns

True if the status code is 200, Raise rate limit error if the status code is 429, False otherwise.

Return type

bool

APIrequests.animeInformationstoCSV(animeList: list) → None¶

Write the list of all the animes’ most important informations to a csv file named anime_information.csv.

Parameters

animeList (list) – List of all the anime.

Returns

None.

Return type

None

APIrequests.animeDescriptiontoCSV(animeList: list) → None¶

Write anime descriptions to csv file named anime_description.csv.

Parameters

animeList (list) – List of all the anime.

Returns

None.

Return type

None

APIrequests.animeGenrestoCSV(animeList: list) → None¶

Write anime genres to csv file named anime_genres.csv.

Parameters

animeList (list) – List of all the anime.

Returns

None.

Return type

None

APIrequests.fixDictionary(anime: dict) → dict¶

Format the dictionary to be able to get nested informations.

Parameters

anime (dict) – Dictionary that contains the anime informations.

Returns

Dictionary with the fixed informations.

Return type

dict

APIrequests.formatDescription(description: str) → str¶

Format the description of the anime to delete tabs, pipes and new lines.

Parameters

description (str) – Anime description.

Returns

Formatted description.

Return type

str

APIrequests.getAnimeListFromJson(response: dict) → list¶

Get the list of anime from the JSON response.

Parameters

response – Dictionary of the response.

Returns

List of anime.

Return type

list

APIrequests.getInformations(anime: dict) → list¶

Get the information of the anime in order to handle KeyError exception.

Parameters

anime (dict) – Dictionary of the anime informations.

Returns

List of anime informations without KeyError exception.

Return type

dict
